4XX.description: Delete a Page Rule response failure

GET /zones/{zone_identifier}/pagerules.description: Fetches Page Rules in a zone.

schema.description: The field used to sort returned Page Rules.
The direction used to sort returned Page Rules.
When set to `all`, all the search requirements must match. When set to `any`, only one of the search requirements has to match.
The status of the Page Rule.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

actions.description: The set of actions to perform if the targets of this rule match the request. Actions can redirect to another URL or override settings, but not both.

modified_on.description: The timestamp of when the override was last modified.

type.description: The response type for the URL redirect.

url.description:
The URL to redirect the request to.
Notes: ${num} refers to the position of '*' in the constraint value.

created_on.description: The timestamp of when the Page Rule was created.

modified_on.description: The timestamp of when the Page Rule was last modified.

priority.description: The priority of the rule, used to define which Page Rule is processed over another. A higher number indicates a higher priority. For example, if you have a catch-all Page Rule (rule A: `/images/*`) but want a more specific Page Rule to take precedence (rule B: `/images/special/*`), specify a higher priority for rule B so it overrides rule A.

status.description: The status of the Page Rule.

targets.description: The rule targets to evaluate on each request.

operator.description: The matches operator can use asterisks and pipes as wildcard and 'or' operators.

value.description: The value to apply the operator to.
The URL pattern to match against the current request. The pattern may contain up to four asterisks ('*') as placeholders.

target.description: A target based on the URL of the request.
